amendment.description: To ensure that the Department of Defense has received an unqualified opinion on its financial statements by October 1, 2027.

vote.text: Amendment SA 230 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 230 proposed by Senator Young to Amendment SA 935. (consideration: CR S3726-3727) To ensure that the Department of Defense has received an unqualified opinion on its financial statements by October 1, 2027.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 230 proposed by Senator Young to Amendment SA 935.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 230 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
